Question
========
When different resistors are connected in parallel, it is true that

Answerlist
----------
* the same current flows in each one.
* the potential difference across each is the same.
* the power dissipated in each is the same.
* their equivalent resistance is greater than the resistance of one of the resistors.

Solution
========
The potential difference is the same across resistors in parallel.
